message.qikas_tconlib.is_duplicate.cantE: Not allowed to edit the tool copy.
modifier.qikas_tconlib.tool_duplicate_ma: Look, I have copies of this tool!
Allow to throw copies of this tool
modifier.qikas_tconlib.is_duplicate.desc:
The copy cannot be merged into the original tool for one of the following reasons:
1. The original tool was not found
2. Unable to merge its storage to the original tool
modifier.qikas_tconlib.tool_uuid_provide: Identity tags for tools to make your tools easily identifiable
modifier.qikas_tconlib.loyalty.descripti: Make the thrown tool return automatically
modifier.qikas_tconlib.loyalty.requireme: "Loyalty" requires the tool to be throwable
